questions.question_text: What is the primary function of a Load Balancer in Google Cloud?
questions.options_json: {"A": "To distribute traffic across multiple instances for high availability", "B": "To cache frequently accessed data to reduce latency", "C": "To provide secure connections between users and applications", "D": "To monitor system performance and alert administrators"}
